name: Solar Fire
overview: Solar Fire is a turn-based tactics strategy game. The Imperial Legion are the elite force of Central Command and you control 6 Legionnaires in their mission to regain control of the Security Zones which have fallen into enemy hands. The Imperial Legion consists of robots as well as humans, and every human Legionnaire is assigned a warrior robot that is programmed to protect its human master. One side wins when the enemy has been eliminated. Victory points are awarded for the skill level selected and the strength of the enemy. If any character moves adjacent to an enemy his movement points will drop to zero and he will be unable to shoot. The game was published as part of a compilation called Action Double.
